title: Champion Filter and it not being a feature on my client?
body:
Hi all,

I recently tried to use the champion filter search when you are in champ select and for whatever reason when 'mage' etc was searched nothing came up. I tried it on a friends client (different computer/same patch) and it worked fine. I tried googling/searching the boards but to no avail could i find any relevant information on how to make this feature work. Any help given would be hugely appreciated!

replies.body:
Hey there,

That sounds odd, I've just tested and it's working on my end.

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5)? let me know if that helps.

Also make sure you're not adding a space or anything when typing out the words (At the start or the end)
